controller

Class MastermindController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MastermindController

  • public class MastermindController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class interacts with the user's guess and the computed answer. Sends booleans to the view, which prints helpful instructions to the console to help to user guess the right answer
    Author:
    Benhur J. Tadiparti

        public boolean check(java.lang.String guess)

        guess - -- user's guess
        Returns:
        true -- if guess is of valid colors and length

      • getRightColorRightPlace

        public int getRightColorRightPlace(java.lang.String guess)

        Returns:
        correct -- the number of colors in the right place

      • getRightColorWrongPlace

        public int getRightColorWrongPlace(java.lang.String guess)
        Checks to see if the guess the correct color, but in different places
        Parameters:
        guess - -- user's guess
        Returns:
        correct -- the numbers of correct color in the computed answer but are in the wrong place in guess

      • throwExceptions

        public void throwExceptions(java.lang.String guess)
                     throws MastermindIllegalColorException,
                            MastermindIllegalLengthException
        Checks to see if the user's guess is valid Also this is for the tester
        Parameters:
        guess - -- user's guess
        Throws:
        MastermindIllegalColorException - -- returns a color error string
        MastermindIllegalLengthException - -- returns a length error string
